= Introduction =
Camel Route Viewer Uses Eclipse-3.4(Ganymede).

A simple reason:
An import new features in the 3.4 JDT is "Rich hovers-Follow links in Javadoc hover",and Camel Route Viewer consults Javadoc-View implement。:)



= Details =

*Required*

You can simple download 


1.Download [http://www.eclipse.org/ Eclipse 3.4].I choose "Eclipse_IDE_for_Java_EE Developers":http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/download.php?file=/technology/epp/downloads/release/ganymede/R/eclipse-jee-ganymede-win32.zip".

2.Download Draw2D、GEF、ZEST.There is a "All-In-One SDK (Runtime, Source, Examples)"version:http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/download.php?file=/tools/gef/downloads/drops/3.4.0/R200806091334/GEF-ALL-3.4.0.zip.

Unzip these plugins into Eclipse.

Then*

Checkout the code and import the project.

Open plugin.xml ,in the testing tab,select Lanuch an Eclipse Application。

In the open new Eclipse workspace,you can click the *configure* method ,then in the camel route view will display the visual route. 

You can use thie Java File for test:http://camel-route-viewer.googlecode.com/files/Test.java
